title: Is it possible to get the APK for the app?
body: I am using an android device but i do not use google store, where else can i download the apk for this app?

replies.body: Please be careful downloading the apk from 3rd parties! There could possibly be bad things packaged in there. :(

Thanks for the reply. I haven't try to download anything from third party app, but is there any official downloading site where I can download the APK for this app?I really have no assess to the google app store.

> [{quoted}](name=The Deckowner,realm=NA,application-id=J7eFAjsN,discussion-id=f3LsywAa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-29T23:26:05.081+0000)
>
> Thanks for the reply. I haven't try to download anything from third party app, but is there any official downloading site where I can download the APK for this app?I really have no assess to the google app store.
